item.title: Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 Release Date and Other Info
item.dc:creator: Manjeet Mahato
item.category: Grey's Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 Release Date
item.description:
Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 is about to premiere next week on ABC, which has been titled “I’ll Cover You” and I think something really big is going to happen in the series now. Grey’s Anatomy is one of the longest run series on ABC, which was first aired on March 27, 2005, and […]

The post Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 Release Date and Other Info appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 is about to premiere next week on ABC, which has been titled “I’ll Cover You” and I think something really big is going to happen in the series now.

Grey’s Anatomy is one of the longest run series on ABC, which was first aired on March 27, 2005, and had been created by Shonda Rhimes. The series revolves around Dr. Meredith Grey played by Ellen Pompeo and Dr. Miranda Bailey played by Chandra Wilson and Dr. Richard Webber whose role has been played by James Pickens Jr.

The series has one spin-off with the name Station 19, which is set in Seattle and is about Seattle Fire Department named Station 19.

Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 Release Date

Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 has been scheduled to be released on Thursday, 12 May 2022 only on ABC Network from 9:00-10:01 p.m. EDT.

What could happen in Season 18 Episode 17?

As per the official synopsis of the show

“A former patient of Link’s, Simon, is in the emergency room with his pregnant wife; Bailey receives an offer from Nick.”

Nick Marsh will get back an old patient back in the emergency but this time with his wife as a patient. And hence Bailey will get an offer from Nick very soon.

Hence there is more to happen in the upcoming Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17.

The Regular Casts who appear on the Series

  • Ellen Pompeo will play the role of Dr. Meredith Grey
  • Chandra Wilson will be back as Dr. Miranda Bailey
  • James Pickens Jr. be reprised as Dr. Richard Webber
  • Justin Chambers will be back as Dr. Alex Karev
  • Kevin McKidd as Dr. Owen Hunt
  • Jesse Williams as Dr. Jackson Avery
  • Bokhee An can be seen as Nurse Bokhee
  • Patrick Dempsey be as Dr. Derek Shepherd
  • Sara Ramirez be back as Dr. Callie Torres
  • Jessica Capshaw can be seen as Dr. Arizona Robbins

We will update you about the other upcoming episodes of Grey’s Anatomy Season 18, Please follow us on Google News.

The post Grey’s Anatomy Season 18 Episode 17 Release Date and Other Info appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Must Watch Series Like Who Killed Sara Season 3
item.dc:creator: Hermione Lovegood
item.category: Who Killed Sara Season 3 Release Date
item.description:
Who Killed Sara Season 3 Update: José Ignacio Valenzuela created the Mexican mystery thriller series ‘Who Killed Sara?’ that is directed by David Ruiz and Bernardo de la Rosa. The plot of the series revolves around a man named Álex Guzmán who is an ex-convict. He was accused of a crime that he did not […]

The post Must Watch Series Like Who Killed Sara Season 3 appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Who Killed Sara Season 3 Update: José Ignacio Valenzuela created the Mexican mystery thriller series ‘Who Killed Sara?’ that is directed by David Ruiz and Bernardo de la Rosa. The plot of the series revolves around a man named Álex Guzmán who is an ex-convict.

He was accused of a crime that he did not commit and spent eighteen years in prison for that. Now he is determined to take revenge for his sister Sara’s death. He begins searching for the people responsible for her death.

nolo Cardona plays the role of the protagonist Álex Guzmán in the series with Ximena Lamadrid starring as the titular Sara Guzmán. The series premiered on March 24, 2021, on Netflix. The third season of the series is set to premiere on the streaming site on May 18, 2022.

Now there are some more series that are quite like ‘Who Killed Sara’ which you should definitely give a try if you enjoy this show.

Must Watch Series Before Who Killed Sara Season 3:

High Seas-
Number of Seasons: 3
Ramón Campos and Gema R. Neira created this Spanish mystery series that revolves around two sisters Eva Villanueva and Carolina Villanueva.

They are traveling from Spain to Brazil on a ship at the end of the 1940s. On the ship, they become involved in the investigation of a number of mysterious events, and deaths.

Hidden Nazi gold and A secret microfilm also come into the scene. An enigmatic woman named Luisa who came to the sisters seeking help gets smuggled on the ship by them. But things become more complicated when she apparently is thrown into the sea.

<span;>Ivana Baquero and Alejandra Onieva play the roles of Eva and Carolina Villanueva respectively in the series. Other cast members of the series include Jon Kortajarena, Eloy Azorin, Manuela Vellés, Chiqui Fernandez, Begoña Vargas etc. The series ran from May 24, 2019, to August 7, 2020, on Netflix.

Dark Desire–
Number of Seasons: 2
Leticia López Margalli created this Mexican erotic thriller drama series that revolves around a number of people- Alma, Leonardo, Zoe, Darío, Esteban, etc.

Professor of law school Alma is wife to Leonardo who is a judge. Alma begins to discover that her husband has kept a lot of things hidden from her.

The couple’s daughter Zoe is of a somewhat rebellious character. Darío is a student of Alma in college who starts to grow feelings for her. Esteban who is a police officer is their brother of Leonard.

Maite Perroni, Jorge Poza, Regina Pavón, Alejandro Speitzer, Erik Hayser play the roles of Alma, Leonard, Zoe, Darío, and Esteban respectively in the series.

Other cast members of the series include María Fernanda Yepes, Catherine Siachoque, Arturo Barba, Ariana Saavedra etc. The series ran from July 15, 2020, to February 2, 2022, on Netflix.

Toy Boy-
Number of Seasons: 2
César Benítz, Juan Carlos Cueto, and Rocío Martínez created this Spanish drama series that uses the Costa del Sol as its setting. The plot of the setting revolves around Hugo Beltrán who is a young stripper.

This handsome man has a carefree attitude. He is in a relationship with a married woman named Macarena Medina. One day Hugo finds himself waking up beside a corpse of a man after a night of partying.

This dead man is his lover’s husband. Though Hugo is unable to remember clearly what happened the previous night, he is assured that he did not murder the man. He also understands that he is being trapped and very soon he gets a fifteen years prison sentence.

Jesús Mosquera plays the role of the protagonist Hugo Beltrán González in the series. Other cast members of the series include Cristina Castaño, María Pedraza, José de la Torre, Carlo Costanzia, Raudel Raúl Martiato, Juanjo Almeida etc. The series premiered on September 8, 2019 on Atresplayer Premium.

Safe-
Number of Seasons: 1
Author of criminal fiction Harlan Coben created this British TV series that revolves around a widowed pediatric surgeon Briton Tom Delaney. He has two daughters who are in their teen years.

Tom faces a challenge to connect with the girls as they are going through a tough period of their lives after their mother’s death one year ago which they still have not become able to get over.

But when his older daughter Jenny is found missing, Tom begins madly searching for her and discovers a series of secrets in that process.

Michael C. Hall, Amy James-Kelly, and Isabelle Allen play the roles of Tom Delaney, Jenny Delaney, and Carrie Delaney respectively in the series. The series premiered on May 10, 2018, on C8 in France and on Netflix internationally.

White Lines-
Number of Seasons: 1
The series focuses on Zoe Walker who finds herself on a dangerous path while looking for her missing brother. Laura Haddock plays the role of Zoe Walker in the series. The series premiered on May 15, 2020, on Netflix.

Source: Google

The post Must Watch Series Like Who Killed Sara Season 3 appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Upload Season 3: Update On Release Date & New Cast Detail
item.dc:creator: Deepak Kumar Gupta
item.description:
Upload Season 3 Update: this is an American Sci-Fi Drama TV series which is created by Greg Daniels. The series was first launched on 1st May 2020. The second season premiered on 11th March 2022.   The first season had a total of 10 Episodes and Season 2 had around 7 Episodes.   The series […]

The post Upload Season 3: Update On Release Date & New Cast Detail appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Upload Season 3 Update: this is an American Sci-Fi Drama TV series which is created by Greg Daniels. The series was first launched on 1st May 2020. The second season premiered on 11th March 2022.  

The first season had a total of 10 Episodes and Season 2 had around 7 Episodes.  

The series has an IMDb rating of 7.9/10.  

The series is about Nathan Brown who has been granted the choice to choose his afterlife after him being dead by uploading his Consciousness into the virtual memory. As time passed, many questions started to arise about his death. 

In the year 2033, humans can upload themselves to virtual memory. Nathan dies Prematurely and is being uploaded to virtual memory. But now he is in control of his Girlfriend, Ingrid.  

Soon Nathan falls for Nora, who is his Living Customer Rep. While Nora is in dilemma of her dad slowly dying and she also believes that Nathan was Murdered.  

Star Cast of Upload Season 3

The show stars Robbie Amell as Nathan Brown, Andy Allo as Nora Antony, Allegra Edwards as Ingrid Kannerman, Zainab Johnson as Aleesha, Kevin Bigley as Luke, and Josh Banday as Ivan in the main lead. 

 What to expect in season 3 

As we all know how season 2 of Upload ended, leaving all the fans on a Cliffhanger and eagerly waiting for the new season.  

Season 2 ends up with Nathan and Andy finally Accepting their relationship with the world, but we can see Nathan’s Nose bleed because of his time initially running out. 

By season 2 we can suggest Choak potentially being Nathan’s Killer, and the creator of the show says that there might be 2 different Nathans in season 3.  

As of now, there are no trailers regarding Season 3, but we are sure makers would release the trailer soon. By season 2 ending on a Cliffhanger, we can surely tell u season 3 has something more to offer than all its previous seasons. 

The post Upload Season 3: Update On Release Date & New Cast Detail appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Is Everything All Right Between Salman & Katrina? find out here.
item.dc:creator: Vishal Kunwar
item.description:
Salman & Katrina Update: Eid is one of the most widely celebrated festivals in the Bollywood industry, from the Baba Siddiqui Iftar party to Arpita Khan Sharma Eid Party, the occasion of Eid is always huge for celebs. A few weeks ago, top B town celebs gathered at Baba Siddiqui Iftar party and the event […]

The post Is Everything All Right Between Salman & Katrina? find out here. appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Salman & Katrina Update: Eid is one of the most widely celebrated festivals in the Bollywood industry, from the Baba Siddiqui Iftar party to Arpita Khan Sharma Eid Party, the occasion of Eid is always huge for celebs.

A few weeks ago, top B town celebs gathered at Baba Siddiqui Iftar party and the event was mesmerizing as stars like SRK, Salman, Sanjay Dutt, Sonakshi Sinha, Riteish Deshmukh, Genelia Dsouza, and many more were present

And now this week it was Salman Khan’s sister Arpita Khan Sharma and her husband Aayush Sharma threw an Eid Bash for Bollywood stars and literally,

All the A list celebs were present at the event with the likes of Salman Khan, Karan Johar, Deepika Padukone with hubby Ranveer Singh, Kangana Ranaut, Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani, Kartik Aaryan, Shehnaaz Gill, and Sushmita Sen, Karishma Kapoor, Sanjay Dutt and to name a few.

Is Everything All Right Between Salman & Katrina?

Some astonishing moments came out of the event like Kangna Ranaut posing at the event, it was shocking for many fans to even see Kangna being present at the event after her online banters against Salman and Bollywood, then a sweet gesture of Shehnaaz hugging Salman became the media attention.

But there was a big celebrity missing out on the event and that was Katrina Kaif, who also had a very friendly relationship with Arpita in the past.

So, as long as this thing was noticed, many people started speculating things in the wrong direction for Katrina who has recently married actor Vicky Kaushal, but to put a full stop to the rumors, we have come up with

the reason why she wasn’t present is that Katrina was with Vicky Kaushal at an undisclosed location where Vicky has been shooting for his film.

So, with that said everything is cool between Arpita, Salman, and Katrina Kaif, and Katrina will also be with Salman in Tiger 3 which will be released in April 2023.

The post Is Everything All Right Between Salman & Katrina? find out here. appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Abbott Elementary Season 2: Everything we know about the Series
item.dc:creator: Manjeet Mahato
item.description:
Abbott Elementary Season 2 is one of the most-awaited series after its season 1 which ended in March 2022 and since then the fans of comedy-drama on ABC are waiting for the series. The mockumentary sitcom television series Abbott Elementary was first aired on ABC on December 7, 2021, which was created with Quinta Brunson […]

The post Abbott Elementary Season 2: Everything we know about the Series appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Abbott Elementary Season 2 is one of the most-awaited series after its season 1 which ended in March 2022 and since then the fans of comedy-drama on ABC are waiting for the series.

The mockumentary sitcom television series Abbott Elementary was first aired on ABC on December 7, 2021, which was created with Quinta Brunson and produced by Werner Walian. The series is about Philadelphia public school’s deaf principal who helps the students to get success in their lives.

When was Abbott Elementary renewed for Season 2?

The Season 2 of ABC’s Abbott Elementary has been confirmed by Janelle James’ character Principal Ava Coleman on Twitter on March 14, 2022, with a message (the message in the form of the principal’s dashboard message for students) that reads:

Fresh off Ava Coleman's desk pic.twitter.com/6ZJjvScJkl

— Abbott Elementary (@AbbottElemABC) March 14, 2022

Abbott Elementary Season 2 Release Date

The series was renewed just a month back so there is not any confirmed release date yet, It was mentioned in Principal Ava’s message that the series is coming back for the session 2022-2023 which means the Abbott Elementary Season 2 will be released in late 2022 and will be run till 2023.

As Quinta Brunson said in one of the interviews with Elle that the writers are writing season 2 and filming has already been started in the ending week of April 2022.

The Cast of Season 2

The main casts of the series are about to come back in the Abbott Elementary Season 2 and a few new casts will also appear in the series:

  • Quinta Brunson will be back as Janine Teagues, who is an optimistic teacher and always try to help students to get success in their life.
  • Tyler James Williams will play the role of Gregory Eddie once again in Season 2.
  • Janelle James will reprise the role of Ava Coleman
  • Lisa Ann Walter may be back as Melissa Schemmenti
  • Chris Perfetti be back as Jacob Hill
  • Sheryl Lee Ralph may be back as Barbara Howard
  • William Stanford Davis will be back as Mr. Johnson
  • Zack Fox may be back as Tariq Temple

We will update you on every detail regarding Abbott Elementary, Please Subscribe to us at Google News.

The post Abbott Elementary Season 2: Everything we know about the Series appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Doctor Strange 2 is about Wanda v/s literally Every Superhero in MCU
item.dc:creator: Manjeet Mahato
item.description:
Doctor Strange 2 was one of the most-awaited movies by Marvel and it hits theaters worldwide today on 6th May 2022 although the movie was released one day ago in the UK and a few other countries of Europe. The first impression which I have got about the film is it’s just about Scarlet Witch […]

The post Doctor Strange 2 is about Wanda v/s literally Every Superhero in MCU appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Doctor Strange 2 was one of the most-awaited movies by Marvel and it hits theaters worldwide today on 6th May 2022 although the movie was released one day ago in the UK and a few other countries of Europe. The first impression which I have got about the film is it’s just about Scarlet Witch or Wanda v/s literally every superhero from Marvel Multiverse. And the acting of Elizabeth Olsen as a witch and mother is really more than awesome and I think she deserves an Academy Nomination this year.

THIS ARTICLE CONTAINS SPOILERS for Doctor Strange 2

How Doctor Strange 2 is about Wanda not about Doctor Strange?

Although it’s a fan side story, I am always one of the nerdiest fans of Scarlet Witch and hr powers which made her one of the strongest Avengers till the introduction of America Cahvez in Doctor Strange 2. The performance of Elizabeth Olsen as Wanda is really overwhelming and I must say you can watch her and feel her presence of her in each and every frame of the movieDoctor Strange 2.

In the movie, Wanda has fought almost all the characters from MCU and other dimensions

Wanda has fought almost all the characters in the movie from Doctor Strange to Captain Carter and America Chavez to Captain Marvel. Almost everyone at the same time and this can prove that she is the strongest and most powerful character in the Marvel Universe at the time when the movie takes place.

Her dialogues are just not written I think they came out of her character like when she says “I’m not going to apologize for the person I’ll become when we first see ” This dialogue shows how strongly she believes in herself and she has not any regrets about her misdeeds, and the same we can feel when we look into her eyes in all the scenes of Doctor Strange 2.

I think that’s the best camera work ever have to be done in MCU which happened to be possible just because of the director Sam Raimi, who is known for his chaotic camera works in every scene and moving shots.

The scene where all the characters are trying to stop Wanda is one of my favorites. The pain inside her of losing her sons and love of her life Vision during the Avengers: Endgame incident and then again in the WandaVision series had really broken her and we cannot feel wrong for her we can only feel her sadness and I think up to some point we could agree with her every moves.

I must admit that you must watch Doctor Strange 2 (Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness) for Elizabeth’s character Wanda which has been released on 6th May, 2022.

The post Doctor Strange 2 is about Wanda v/s literally Every Superhero in MCU appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Love & Anarchy Season 2 Trailer: Release Date Announced
item.dc:creator: Manjeet Mahato
item.description:
Love & Anarchy Season 2 Trailer has been dropped by Netflix on its’ Youtube Channel in which we can see the Team at Lund & Lagerstedt – Sofie and Max are finally back together in the upcoming season. In the Beginningof the trailer we can see Sofie (Ida Engvoll) entering into the office of Lund […]

The post Love & Anarchy Season 2 Trailer: Release Date Announced appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Love & Anarchy Season 2 Trailer has been dropped by Netflix on its’ Youtube Channel in which we can see the Team at Lund & Lagerstedt – Sofie and Max are finally back together in the upcoming season.

In the Beginningof the trailer we can see Sofie (Ida Engvoll) entering into the office of Lund & Lagerstedt, Then we can see Ronny (Björn Kjellman) with the bicycle in his hand, then we see Ma (Björn Mosten) launghing at one of Ronny’s joke.

The spark between Sofie and Max can be seen in the trailer of Love & Anarchy Season 2 too.

The trailer is full of possible drama and anarchy and a lot of love and romance which we will witness in the upcoming season.

About The Series

Love & Anarchy is a Swedish romantic comedy series that was first premiered on n 4 November 2020, which revolves around Sofie and Max who works for a publishing house Lund & Lagerstedt. The series has contradicted various social norms in Sweden and has risen to a most-viewed series for it’s season 1.

The series has been developed by Lisa Langseth (you may be familiar with her work on Euphoria starring Zendaya) and produced by Fatima Varhos. It’s the second Netflix Original Swedish Series after Quicksand.

The series has 7.4 out of 10 ratings on IMDb and has a popularity of 2,844.

The Release Date of Love & Anarchy Season 2

As per the Trailer of the Love & Anarchy Season 2 the upcoming season is all set to be released on Netflix on June 16, 2022.

The Cast of Season 2

The major characters will ceratinly be back in the series and a few new casts have also been added in Love & Anarchy Season 2.

Ida Engvoll will be back as Sofie Rydman

Björn Mosten is coming back as Max Järvi

Björn Kjellman is coming back as Ronny

Carla Sehn will also be back as Caroline

Other Casts will also be back with their respective Characters. We will update you about every details of Season 2 Please Follow us on Google News.

The post Love & Anarchy Season 2 Trailer: Release Date Announced appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Teen Titans Go! Season 7 Part B: When Will It Release? and More
item.dc:creator: Deepak Kumar Gupta

Teen Titans Go! Season 7 Part B Update
item.description:
Teen Titans Go! is an American animated TV series that is based on the DC comic superheroes team. The show is launched after the success of New Teen Titans. Teen Titans Go! Is a more comedic way to take up DC comics. A comedy animated series which has no continuity with its Previous seasons regardless […]

The post Teen Titans Go! Season 7 Part B: When Will It Release? and More appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Teen Titans Go! is an American animated TV series that is based on the DC comic superheroes team. The show is launched after the success of New Teen Titans. Teen Titans Go! Is a more comedic way to take up DC comics.

A comedy animated series which has no continuity with its Previous seasons regardless of its main characters. We can see many DC comic characters making cameos in the series.

The first season Was released on 23rd April in the year 2013, and the most recent season 7 was aired on 8th January in the year 2021. As of there are a total of 350 episodes released.

Teen Titans Go! Has an IMDb rating of 5.3/10. It follows the story of Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Raven, and Beast Boy who are roommates trying to save the world, but what happens when they are bored of fighting crimes?

Teen Titans Go! Season 7 Part B: When Will It Release?

The new season of Teen Titans Go! It will premiere on 14th May 2022.

It may have a total of 52 Episodes.

The characters of this animated series have been voiced by the following celebrities.

Greg Cipes as Beast Boy, Scott Menville as Robin, Khary Payton as Cyborg, Tara Strong as Raven, Hynden Walch as Starfire, Lauren Tom as Gizmo.

As per rumors, it is believed that Teen Titans Go! Will go off-air after season 8.

In season 7 we saw the series go on hiatus all over June and July.

We saw the superheroes decide who is doing laundry, making sandwiches and who is saving the city. But one thing is sure, the titans are always ready for adventure.

In the next season, we may see many new characters like Beard Hunter, King Shark, and many more.

If you are a fan of Teen Titans Go! Then we are sure you would be eagerly waiting for the new season to arrive and see your favorite heroes saving the city and many more.

The post Teen Titans Go! Season 7 Part B: When Will It Release? and More appeared first on Daily Research Plot.

item.title: Conversation with Friends: Update On Release Date & Much More
item.dc:creator: Deepak Kumar Gupta
item.description:
Conversations with Friends is a TV series based on the novel Conversations with Friends, which was published in 2017 and written by Sally Rooney. The show is directed by Leanne Welham and Lenny Abrahamson. The show is produced by Catherine Magee and Jeanie Igoe.  Star cast  The casting was made in February 2021, the show […]

The post Conversation with Friends: Update On Release Date & Much More appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
item.content:encoded:
Conversations with Friends is a TV series based on the novel Conversations with Friends, which was published in 2017 and written by Sally Rooney. The show is directed by Leanne Welham and Lenny Abrahamson. The show is produced by Catherine Magee and Jeanie Igoe. 

Star cast 

The casting was made in February 2021, the show stars Alison Oliver as Frances, Sasha Lane as Bobbi Connolly, Joe Alwyn as Nick Conway, and Jemima Conway as the main lead.

In the year 2020, it was announced that the Conversations with Friends novel will be made into a Series. The shooting started in April 2021, in Northern Ireland.

The series will be released on 15th May 2022 on BBC Three and Hulu. And on 18th May it will be released on RTE One.

About Conversations with Friends 

Conversations with Friends is a story of Frances who is a 21-year-old college student, after a lot of non-stable relationships she finally opened up all her vulnerabilities for the first time. Frances is quite thoughtful, ideal, and sharp.

Even after Frances and Bobbi broke up three years ago, they still look quite inseparable. In one of the shows, they meet Melissa who is a writer and she is impressed with the pair. Both Bobbi and Frances start meeting with Melissa and her husband Nick who is an Actor.

After a while, Melissa and Bobbi start to flirt Infront of everyone meanwhile Nick and Frances are having a secret affair. Soon after being in the affair the real test of the bond between Frances and Bobbi is put on the test and Frances starts to realize her true self and the friendship bonds she has.

On February 8th the teaser was released with the tagline “it’s never just friends”. And on the 15th may the show will be officially released with a total of 12 episodes each with a runtime of 30-35 minutes.

You can watch the trailer here Conversations with Friends | Official Trailer | Hulu

 If you are a fan of some romantic series with some twists then this should be on your watch list.

The post Conversation with Friends: Update On Release Date & Much More appeared first on Daily Research Plot.
